title: How do the worlds competitors handle all the pressure of the playing environment?
body:
playing in that large open space with all those fans roaring and flashing lights.

As a guy with a weird shaped head, those headphones do not look comfortable at all. They look like they have vices clamping their skulls.

replies.body:
I'm sure it gets easier over time and with enough time.  Ever had to stand in front of your classmates back in school before?  I remember they first time I had to and I was scared and nervous etc, however my teachers in 4th grade and 7th-10th made us stand up infront of our peers almost everyday to present a 1-2 min project or just answer her questions.  
  It took the pressure off us over time to the point where we didn't feel scared when we had to stand up infront of others at random times. 
  The same thing here for the League players some have been playing for 4 years on stage and don't care about what some random people think about them etc.

How do people handle the pressure of the olympics or fifa or any large scale top tier play?

Also Im sure they would choose comfortable headphones.
